SELECT COMPANY_CODE ,DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,DEPT_SNAME ,DEPT_ENAME ,DEPT_ESNAME ,COST_CODE ,DEPT_DIV ,COSTDEPT_CODE ,TERMINATE_DATE ,BUSINESS_CODE ,SORT_ORDER ,USING_TAG ,TAX_COMPANY_CODE ,COST_TAG ,OFFICE_CODE ,BUDGET_CONTROLTAG ,TAX_OFFICE_CODE ,COST_DEPT_CODE ,RESIDENT_PAY_PLACE ,FIRST_REGIST_DATE ,PAY_ACNT_CODE ,BONUS_ACNT_CODE ,AREA_DIV ,FC_DEPT ,MANUFAC_DIV ,PROJ_DEPOSIT_NO ,NATION_CD ,UPPER_DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_TYPE_DIV ,BONBOO_CODE ,SIL_CODE ,PROJ_SORT_ORDER ,PROJ_DEGREE_NUM ,ORG_DISP_YN ,TAX_DIV ,FOOD_DEPOSIT_YN ,ACC_END_DATE ,TO_SORT_ORDER ,DEPT_GROUP ,EDI_MANAGE_NO FROM SM_CODE_DEPT /*A LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_DEPT C ON (A.COMPANY_CODE = C.COMPANY_CODE AND A.COST_DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_OFFICE D ON (A.COMPANY_CODE = D.COMPANY_CODE AND A.OFFICE_CODE = D.OFFICE_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_COMPANY E ON (A.TAX_COMPANY_CODE = E.COMPANY_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_TAXOFFICE F ON (A.TAX_OFFICE_CODE = F.TAX_OFFICE_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_DEPT G ON A.LEVEL1 = G.DEPT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_DEPT H ON A.LEVEL2 = H.DEPT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_CODE_DEPT I ON A.LEVEL3 = I.DEPT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN AC_CODE_DEPOSIT J ON A.DEPOSIT_NO = J.DEPOSIT_NO*/ WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #as_compcode# AND ((DEPT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{deptcode}||'%' ) OR (DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{deptcode}||'%')) AND (USING_TAG = #{useyn} OR #{useyn} = '%') /*ORDER BY NVL(A.LEVEL1,'0'),NVL(A.LEVEL2,'0'), NVL(A.LEVEL3,'0'), A.SORT_ORDER*/ ORDER BY SORT_ORDER
